display_html:
data BlockHeader = BlockHeader {
  • _bhPrevHash :: !Hash
  • _bhSlot :: !Slot
  • _bhIssuer :: !VKey
  • _bhSig :: !(Sig Hash)
  • _bhUtxoHash :: !Hash
  • _bhDlgHash :: !Hash
  • _bhUpdHash :: !Hash
}
name: BlockHeader BlockHeader _bhUpdHash _bhDlgHash _bhUtxoHash _bhSig _bhIssuer _bhSlot _bhPrevHash

display_html:
data BlockBody = BlockBody {
  • _bDCerts :: ![DCert]
  • _bUtxo :: ![Tx]
  • _bUpdProp :: !(Maybe UProp)
  • _bUpdVotes :: ![Vote]
  • _bProtVer :: !ProtVer
}
name: BlockBody BlockBody _bProtVer _bUpdVotes _bUpdProp _bUtxo _bDCerts

display_html:
data Block = Block {
  • _bHeader :: BlockHeader
  • _bBody :: BlockBody
}
name: Block Block _bBody _bHeader

display_html: mkBlock :: Hash -> Slot -> VKey -> ProtVer -> [DCert] -> Maybe UProp -> [Vote] -> [Tx] -> Block
name: mkBlock

data BlockStats = BlockStats {

  • blockStatsDCerts :: Word
  • blockStatsUpdVotes :: Word

}
name: BlockStats BlockStats blockStatsUpdProp blockStatsUpdVotes blockStatsDCerts blockStatsUtxo
BbodyPredicateFailure UTXOWSFailure DelegationFailure BUPIFailure InvalidUpdateProposalHash InvalidDelegationHash InvalidUtxoHash InvalidBlockSize

display_html:
data PbftPredicateFailure
  • = SlotNotAfterLastBlock Slot Slot
  • | SlotInTheFuture Slot Slot
  • | PrevHashNotMatching Hash Hash
  • | InvalidHeaderSignature VKey (Sig Hash)
  • | SigCountFailure (PredicateFailure SIGCNT)
name: PbftPredicateFailure SigCountFailure InvalidHeaderSignature PrevHashNotMatching SlotInTheFuture SlotNotAfterLastBlock

display_html:
data ChainPredicateFailure
  • = EpochFailure (PredicateFailure EPOCH)
  • | HeaderSizeTooBig BlockHeader Natural (Threshold Natural)
  • | BBodyFailure (PredicateFailure BBODY)
  • | PBFTFailure (PredicateFailure PBFT)
  • | MaximumBlockSize Natural Natural
  • | LedgerDelegationFailure (PredicateFailure DELEG)
  • | LedgerUTxOFailure (PredicateFailure UTXOWS)
name: ChainPredicateFailure LedgerUTxOFailure LedgerDelegationFailure MaximumBlockSize PBFTFailure BBodyFailure HeaderSizeTooBig EpochFailure
